languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, помилуйте! Я не смею вам перечить, но это же такая опасность и для вас, и для станции! Мы... мы освободим для вас проход. Но на это потребуется время, и много — разобрать баррикады и деактивировать мины непросто". {n}Мужчина бросает на вас долгий взгляд, видимо, надеясь, что вы передумаете. Но, не дождавшись реакции, отдает указания помощникам.{/n}

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, have mercy! I can't say no to you, but the danger is just as real to you as it is to the whole station! We'll... We'll clear a way for you. But it'll take time, a lot of time — it won't be easy to break down the barricades and disarm the mines." {n}He gives you a long look, likely hoping that you will reconsider. But, after receiving no reaction, he gives the order to his assistants.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, помилуйте! Я не смею вам перечить, но это же такая опасность и для вас, и для станции! Мы... мы освободим для вас проход. Но на это потребуется время, и много — разобрать баррикады и деактивировать мины непросто". {n}Мужчина бросает на вас долгий взгляд, видимо, надеясь, что вы передумаете. Но, не дождавшись реакции, отдает указания помощникам.{/n}

But, having received no reaction, he gives the order to his assistants.{/n}

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, have mercy! I can't say no to you, but the danger is just as real to you as it is to the whole station! We'll... We'll clear a way for you. But it'll take time, a lot of time — it won't be easy to break down the barricades and disarm the mines." {n}He gives you a long look, likely hoping that you will reconsider. But, after receiving no reaction, he gives the order to his assistants.{/n}

languages.text: “大人，求求您行行好吧！我没办法拒绝您的要求，但这里的危险是实打实的，就像这座舰站一样实打实！我们……我们会为您开辟一条道路，但这要花时间，要花很多很多时间，清理路障和地雷没那么容易。”{n}他看着你，似乎希望你能重新考虑一下。不过，当他没有得到任何回应之后，他朝他的助手们下达了命令。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, have mercy! I can't say no to you, but the danger is just as real to you as it is to the whole station! We'll... We'll clear a way for you. But it'll take time, a lot of time — it won't be easy to break down the barricades and disarm the mines." {n}He gives you a long look, likely hoping that you will reconsider. But, after receiving no reaction, he gives the order to his assistants.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “大人，求求您行行好吧！我没办法拒绝您的要求，但这里的危险是实打实的，就像这座舰站一样实打实！我们……我们会为您开辟一条道路，但这要花时间，要花很多很多时间，清理路障和地雷没那么容易。”{n}他看着你，似乎希望你能重新考虑一下。不过，当他没有得到任何回应之后，他朝他的助手们下达了命令。{/n}

languages.text: «¡Mi{mf|lord|lady}, tenga piedad! No puedo negarle nada, pero el riesgo que corre es el mismo que cualquier otra persona de la estación. Le... le despejaremos un camino. Pero necesitaremos tiempo, y mucho. No es fácil desmontar las barricadas y retirar los campos de minas». {n}Te mira, con esperanzas de que recapacites. Cuando no lo haces, da la orden a sus ayudantes.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, have mercy! I can't say no to you, but the danger is just as real to you as it is to the whole station! We'll... We'll clear a way for you. But it'll take time, a lot of time — it won't be easy to break down the barricades and disarm the mines." {n}He gives you a long look, likely hoping that you will reconsider. But, after receiving no reaction, he gives the order to his assistants.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Mi{mf|lord|lady}, tenga piedad! No puedo negarle nada, pero el riesgo que corre es el mismo que cualquier otra persona de la estación. Le... le despejaremos un camino. Pero necesitaremos tiempo, y mucho. No es fácil desmontar las barricadas y retirar los campos de minas». {n}Te mira, con esperanzas de que recapacites. Cuando no lo haces, da la orden a sus ayudantes.{/n}

languages.text: 「陛下、勘弁してください！貴方にノーとはとても言えない…だけどステーションそのものもそうですが、本当に危険なんです！私共は…貴方のために道を開けます。ですが時間がかかるんですよ、それはもう…バリケードと地雷はそう易々と撤去できるものじゃないんです」{n}作業長はこちらが考え直すことを期待してか、じっとこちらを見つめていたが、こちらの反応がないと分かると、部下に指示を出した。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, have mercy! I can't say no to you, but the danger is just as real to you as it is to the whole station! We'll... We'll clear a way for you. But it'll take time, a lot of time — it won't be easy to break down the barricades and disarm the mines." {n}He gives you a long look, likely hoping that you will reconsider. But, after receiving no reaction, he gives the order to his assistants.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、勘弁してください！貴方にノーとはとても言えない…だけどステーションそのものもそうですが、本当に危険なんです！私共は…貴方のために道を開けます。ですが時間がかかるんですよ、それはもう…バリケードと地雷はそう易々と撤去できるものじゃないんです」{n}作業長はこちらが考え直すことを期待してか、じっとこちらを見つめていたが、こちらの反応がないと分かると、部下に指示を出した。{/n}

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, habt bitte Erbarmen! Ich kann Euch das nicht verweigern, aber die Gefahr ist für Euch genauso real wie für die gesamte Station! Wir ... wir machen Euch einen Weg frei. Aber das wird dauern, ziemlich lange sogar – es wird nicht einfach, die Barrikaden zu entfernen und die Minen zu entschärfen." {n}Er sieht dich lange an, wahrscheinlich in der Hoffnung, dass du es dir anders überlegst. Aber als darauf keine Reaktion erfolgt, erteilt er seinen Assistenten den Befehl.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, have mercy! I can't say no to you, but the danger is just as real to you as it is to the whole station! We'll... We'll clear a way for you. But it'll take time, a lot of time — it won't be easy to break down the barricades and disarm the mines." {n}He gives you a long look, likely hoping that you will reconsider. But, after receiving no reaction, he gives the order to his assistants.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, habt bitte Erbarmen! Ich kann Euch das nicht verweigern, aber die Gefahr ist für Euch genauso real wie für die gesamte Station! Wir ... wir machen Euch einen Weg frei. Aber das wird dauern, ziemlich lange sogar – es wird nicht einfach, die Barrikaden zu entfernen und die Minen zu entschärfen." {n}Er sieht dich lange an, wahrscheinlich in der Hoffnung, dass du es dir anders überlegst. Aber als darauf keine Reaktion erfolgt, erteilt er seinen Assistenten den Befehl.{/n}

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, par pitié ! Je ne peux pas vous l'interdire, mais vous mettrez en danger toute la station, et pas seulement vous-même ! Bon... On va vous dégager un chemin. Mais il va nous falloir du temps, beaucoup de temps... Ce sera pas simple d'abattre les barricades et de désamorcer les mines. » {n}Il vous observe longuement, comme s'il espérait vous faire changer d'avis. Mais face à votre absence de réaction, il donne l'ordre à ses assistants de procéder.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, have mercy! I can't say no to you, but the danger is just as real to you as it is to the whole station! We'll... We'll clear a way for you. But it'll take time, a lot of time — it won't be easy to break down the barricades and disarm the mines." {n}He gives you a long look, likely hoping that you will reconsider. But, after receiving no reaction, he gives the order to his assistants.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, par pitié ! Je ne peux pas vous l'interdire, mais vous mettrez en danger toute la station, et pas seulement vous-même ! Bon... On va vous dégager un chemin. Mais il va nous falloir du temps, beaucoup de temps... Ce sera pas simple d'abattre les barricades et de désamorcer les mines. » {n}Il vous observe longuement, comme s'il espérait vous faire changer d'avis. Mais face à votre absence de réaction, il donne l'ordre à ses assistants de procéder.{/n}

languages.text: "İnsaf edin {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Sizi engelleyecek hâlim yok ama durum hem sizin hem de tüm istasyon için tehlike arz ediyor! Size... Yol açabiliriz ama zaman alır, hem de çok. Barikatları yıkıp mayınları etkisiz hâle getirmek kolay olmayacak." {n}Muhtemelen tekrar düşüneceğini umarak sana uzun uzun bakıyor ama hiçbir tepki alamayınca emirleri yardımcılarına iletiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, have mercy! I can't say no to you, but the danger is just as real to you as it is to the whole station! We'll... We'll clear a way for you. But it'll take time, a lot of time — it won't be easy to break down the barricades and disarm the mines." {n}He gives you a long look, likely hoping that you will reconsider. But, after receiving no reaction, he gives the order to his assistants.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "İnsaf, {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Sizi engelleyecek hâlim yok ama hem siz hem de tüm istasyon için tehlike arz ediyor durum! Size... Bir yol açabiliriz ama zaman alacak, çok zaman alacak. Barikatları yıkıp mayınları etkisiz hâle getirmek kolay olmayacak." {n}Muhtemelen tekrar düşüneceğini umarak sana uzun uzun bakıyor ama hiçbir tepki alamayınca emirleri yardımcılarına iletiyor.{/n}
